Vampirtron:

     He moved slowly towards the door, always looking at Kenzo, when 
he go to the door it whoshed open. He growled again, red eyes 
blazing, when they faded, when his eyes lit up again they were 
their "natural" blue. 
     "Thank the Matrix," He said, and colapsed in a heap.
